about_the_game:
Caesar and Cleopatra were kidnapped by the Roman goddess Discordia!

Don't waste time and go on a journey full of adventure, myths and legends.

Defeat fearsome monsters and solve tricky tasks! Build new settlements, clear destroyed
roads and face insurmountable obstacles, in this exciting time management adventure.
Can you manage to free Caesar and Cleopatra in time from the clutches of the goddess of revenge?
Find out in the second part of this game series.

• Adventure in Roman times
• Many challenging and exciting levels
• Adventures in forest and caves, snow and ice landscape, swamp, volcano and mountain landscape
• Awards and trophies
• Mode without time limit for a relaxed gaming experience

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows XP / 7 / 8 / 10 / 11
  • Processor: Intel Core Duo 2 2.5 GHz
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Onboard graphic card
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Onboard Soundcard
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows XP / 7 / 8 / 10 / 11
  • Processor: Intel Core Duo 2 2.5 GHz
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: ATI Radeon HD 4800 Series
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Onboard Soundcard
